title: African Roar 2011
description: African Roar 2011, is the second in a series of annual anthologies dedicated to publishing new short fiction by African writers, edited by Emmanuel Sigauke and Ivor Hartmann. Featuring: Zukiswa Wanner, Memory Chirere, Uche Peter Umez, the late Ruzvidzo Stanley Mupfudza (to whom the anthology is dedicated), NoViolet Bulawayo, Mbonisi P. Ncube, Hajira Amla, Murenga Joseph Chikowero, Dango Mkandawire, Emmanuel Sigauke, Emmanuel Iduma, Ivor Hartmann, Chimdindu Mazi-Njoku, Ayodele Morocco-Clarke, and Isaac Neequaye.
author: Emmanuel Sigauke
